00055 #define orxSTRUCTURE_GET_POINTER(STRUCTURE, TYPE) ((orx##TYPE *)_orxStructure_GetPointer(STRUCTURE, orxSTRUCTURE_ID_##TYPE))
00056 
00057 #define orxSTRUCTURE(STRUCTURE)     (((STRUCTURE != orxNULL) && (((((orxSTRUCTURE *)STRUCTURE)->u64GUID & orxSTRUCTURE_GUID_MASK_STRUCTURE_ID) >> orxSTRUCTURE_GUID_SHIFT_STRUCTURE_ID) < orxSTRUCTURE_ID_NUMBER)) ? (orxSTRUCTURE *)STRUCTURE : (orxSTRUCTURE *)orxNULL)

00083 #define orxSTRUCTURE_REGISTER(TYPE, STORAGE_TYPE, MEMORY_TYPE, UPDATE_FUNCTION) \
00084   orxStructure_Register(orxSTRUCTURE_ID_##TYPE, STORAGE_TYPE, MEMORY_TYPE, sizeof(orx##TYPE), UPDATE_FUNCTION)

00088 #define orxSTRUCTURE_ASSERT(STRUCTURE)                          \
00089   orxASSERT((STRUCTURE != orxNULL) && (((((orxSTRUCTURE *)(STRUCTURE))->u64GUID & orxSTRUCTURE_GUID_MASK_STRUCTURE_ID) >> orxSTRUCTURE_GUID_SHIFT_STRUCTURE_ID) < orxSTRUCTURE_ID_NUMBER));

00093 #define orxSTRUCTURE_GUID_MAGIC_TAG_DELETED   0xDEFACED0DEADC0DEULL
00094 
00097 #define orxSTRUCTURE_GUID_MASK_STRUCTURE_ID   0x000000000000001FULL
00098 #define orxSTRUCTURE_GUID_SHIFT_STRUCTURE_ID  0
00099 
00100 #define orxSTRUCTURE_GUID_MASK_ITEM_ID        0x0000FFFF00000000ULL
00101 #define orxSTRUCTURE_GUID_SHIFT_ITEM_ID       32
00102 
00103 #define orxSTRUCTURE_GUID_MASK_REF_COUNTER    0xFFFF000000000000ULL
00104 #define orxSTRUCTURE_GUID_SHIFT_REF_COUNTER   48
00105 
00106 #define orxSTRUCTURE_GUID_MASK_INSTANCE_ID    0x00000000FFFFFFE0ULL
00107 #define orxSTRUCTURE_GUID_SHIFT_INSTANCE_ID   5

00112 typedef enum __orxSTRUCTURE_ID_t
00113 {
00114   /* *** Following structures can be linked to objects *** */
00115 
00116   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_ANIMPOINTER = 0,
00117   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_BODY,
00118   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_CLOCK,
00119   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_FRAME,
00120   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_FXPOINTER,
00121   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_GRAPHIC,
00122   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_SHADERPOINTER,
00123   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_SOUNDPOINTER,
00124   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_SPAWNER,
00125   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_TIMELINE,
00126 
00127   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_LINKABLE_NUMBER,
00128 
00129   /* *** Below this point, structures can not be linked to objects *** */
00130 
00131   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_ANIM = orxSTRUCTURE_ID_LINKABLE_NUMBER,
00132   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_ANIMSET,
00133   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_CAMERA,
00134   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_FONT,
00135   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_FX,
00136   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_OBJECT,
00137   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_SHADER,
00138   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_SOUND,
00139   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_TEXT,
00140   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_TEXTURE,
00141   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_VIEWPORT,
00142 
00143   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_NUMBER,
00144 
00145   orxSTRUCTURE_ID_NONE = orxENUM_NONE
00146 
00147 } orxSTRUCTURE_ID;

00165 {
00166   orxU64          u64GUID;          
00167   orxHANDLE       hStorageNode;   
00168   orxU32          u32Flags;

00189 static orxINLINE orxSTRUCTURE *_orxStructure_GetPointer(const void *_pStructure, orxSTRUCTURE_ID _eStructureID)
00190 {
00191   orxSTRUCTURE *pstResult;
00192 
00193   /* Updates result */
00194   pstResult = ((_pStructure != orxNULL) && ((((orxSTRUCTURE *)_pStructure)->u64GUID & orxSTRUCTURE_GUID_MASK_STRUCTURE_ID) >> orxSTRUCTURE_GUID_SHIFT_STRUCTURE_ID) == _eStructureID) ? (orxSTRUCTURE *)_pStructure : (orxSTRUCTURE *)orxNULL;
00195 
00196   /* Done! */
00197   return pstResult;
00198 }

00331 static orxINLINE void                                   orxStructure_IncreaseCounter(void *_pStructure)
00332 {
00333   orxU64 u64Counter;
00334 
00335   /* Checks */
00336   orxSTRUCTURE_ASSERT(_pStructure);
00337 
00338   /* Gets current counter */
00339   u64Counter = (orxSTRUCTURE(_pStructure)->u64GUID & orxSTRUCTURE_GUID_MASK_REF_COUNTER) >> orxSTRUCTURE_GUID_SHIFT_REF_COUNTER;
00340 
00341   /* Updates it */
00342   u64Counter++;
00343 
00344   /* Checks */
00345   orxASSERT(u64Counter <= (orxSTRUCTURE_GUID_MASK_REF_COUNTER >> orxSTRUCTURE_GUID_SHIFT_REF_COUNTER));
00346 
00347   /* Stores it */
00348   orxSTRUCTURE(_pStructure)->u64GUID = (orxSTRUCTURE(_pStructure)->u64GUID & ~orxSTRUCTURE_GUID_MASK_REF_COUNTER) | (u64Counter << orxSTRUCTURE_GUID_SHIFT_REF_COUNTER);
00349 
00350   /* Done! */
00351   return;
00352 }
00353 
00357 static orxINLINE void                                   orxStructure_DecreaseCounter(void *_pStructure)
00358 {
00359   orxU64 u64Counter;
00360 
00361   /* Checks */
00362   orxSTRUCTURE_ASSERT(_pStructure);
00363 
00364   /* Gets current counter */
00365   u64Counter = (orxSTRUCTURE(_pStructure)->u64GUID & orxSTRUCTURE_GUID_MASK_REF_COUNTER) >> orxSTRUCTURE_GUID_SHIFT_REF_COUNTER;
00366 
00367   /* Checks */
00368   orxASSERT(u64Counter > 0);
00369 
00370   /* Updates it */
00371   u64Counter--;
00372 
00373   /* Stores it */
00374   orxSTRUCTURE(_pStructure)->u64GUID = (orxSTRUCTURE(_pStructure)->u64GUID & ~orxSTRUCTURE_GUID_MASK_REF_COUNTER) | (u64Counter << orxSTRUCTURE_GUID_SHIFT_REF_COUNTER);
00375 
00376   /* Done! */
00377   return;
00378 }
00379 
00384 static orxINLINE orxU32                                 orxStructure_GetRefCounter(const void *_pStructure)
00385 {
00386   /* Checks */
00387   orxSTRUCTURE_ASSERT(_pStructure);
00388 
00389   /* Done! */
00390   return((orxU32)((orxSTRUCTURE(_pStructure)->u64GUID & orxSTRUCTURE_GUID_MASK_REF_COUNTER) >> orxSTRUCTURE_GUID_SHIFT_REF_COUNTER));
00391 }

00397 static orxINLINE orxU64                                 orxStructure_GetGUID(const void *_pStructure)
00398 {
00399   /* Checks */
00400   orxSTRUCTURE_ASSERT(_pStructure);
00401 
00402   /* Done! */
00403   return orxSTRUCTURE(_pStructure)->u64GUID;
00404 }

00410 static orxINLINE orxSTRUCTURE_ID                        orxStructure_GetID(const void *_pStructure)
00411 {
00412   /* Checks */
00413   orxSTRUCTURE_ASSERT(_pStructure);
00414 
00415   /* Done! */
00416   return((orxSTRUCTURE_ID)((orxSTRUCTURE(_pStructure)->u64GUID & orxSTRUCTURE_GUID_MASK_STRUCTURE_ID) >> orxSTRUCTURE_GUID_SHIFT_STRUCTURE_ID));
00417 }

00424 static orxINLINE orxBOOL                                orxStructure_TestFlags(const void *_pStructure, orxU32 _u32Flags)
00425 {
00426   /* Checks */
00427   orxSTRUCTURE_ASSERT(_pStructure);
00428 
00429   /* Done! */
00430   return(orxFLAG_TEST(orxSTRUCTURE(_pStructure)->u32Flags, _u32Flags));

00438 static orxINLINE orxBOOL                                orxStructure_TestAllFlags(const void *_pStructure, orxU32 _u32Flags)
00439 {
00440   /* Checks */
00441   orxSTRUCTURE_ASSERT(_pStructure);
00442 
00443   /* Done! */
00444   return(orxFLAG_TEST_ALL(orxSTRUCTURE(_pStructure)->u32Flags, _u32Flags));
00445 }

00468   /* Checks */
